about_the_game:
Space of another reality is an extendable virtual reality project that facilitates the students’ exploration of virtual happenings, virtual events and virtual entrepreneurship through the current theoretical, industrial and technological frameworks at XJTLU’s School of Cultural Technology
The project is designed to create an allowance for an industrially engaged and project-based environment where students are encouraged to conceptualise, plan and execute a variety of content production that represent the current pioneering intersections of AR, VR, XR, imaging, moving image, virtual avatar and meta matters in a co-constructed virtual environment of interactivity

short_description: This is a virtual exhibition game. Players navigate the exhibition space from a first-person perspective reminiscent of an FPS game. The virtual exhibition space is divided into several small exhibition sectors. Each sector displays its independent virtual installation.
